Academy.function: May perform one THINKER action after turn during which you performed CRAFTSMAN action

Amphitheatre.function: May perform one CRAFTSMAN action for each INFLUENCE

Aqueduct.function: When performing PATRON action may take client from HAND.  Maximum CLIENTELE x 2

Archway.function: When performing ARCHITECT action may take material from POOL

Atrium.function: When performing MERCHANT action may take from DECK (do not look at card)

Bar.function: When performing PATRON action may take card from DECK

Basilica.function: When performing MERCHANT action may take material from HAND

Bath.function: When performing PATRON action each client you hire may perform its action once as it enters CLIENTELE

Bridge.function: When performing LEGIONARY action may take material from STOCKPILE.  Ignore Palisades.  May take from all opponents

Catacomb.function: Game ends immediately.  Score as usual

Circus.function: May play two cards of same role as JACK

Circus Maximus.function: Each client may perform its action twice when you lead or follow its role

Coliseum.function: When performing LEGIONARY action may take opponent's client and place in VAULT as material

Dock.function: When performing LABORER action may take material from HAND

Forum.function: One client of each role wins game

Foundry.function: May perform one LABORER action for each INFLUENCE

Fountain.function: When performing CRAFTSMAN action may use cards from DECK.  Retain any unused cards in HAND

Garden.function: May perform one PATRON action for each INFLUENCE

Latrine.function: Before performing THINKER action may discard one card to POOL

Ludus Magna.function: Each MERCHANT client counts as any role

Palace.function: May play multiple cards of same role in order to perform additional actions

Prison.function: May exchange INFLUENCE for opponent's completed structure

Road.function: When adding to STONE structure may use any material

School.function: May perform one THINKER action for each INFLUENCE

Scriptorium.function: May use one MARBLE material to complete any structure

Senate.function: May take opponent's JACK into HAND at end of turn in which it is played

Sewer.function: May place Orders cards used to lead or follow into STOCKPILE at end of turn

Stairway.function: When performing ARCHITECT action may add material to opponent's completed STRUCTURE to make function available to all players

Statue.function: + 3 VP. May place Statue on any SITE

Tower.function: May use RUBBLE in any STRUCTURE.  May lay foundation onto any out of town SITE at no extra cost

Villa.function: When performing ARCHITECT action may complete Villa with one material

Vomitorium.function: Before performing THINKER action may discard all cards to POOL

Wall.function: Immune to LEGIONARY.  + 1 VP for every two materials in STOCKPILE
